name: Ari Fleischer
description:
You might have guessed from the various profiles on this website that we're not exactly fans of George W. Bush's presidential administration. So even when the voice of that administration was Ari Fleischer, a Jew, we didn't exactly jump on that bandwagon. 

It would take much more than that. Say, honesty. And competence. And just a touch of sincerity. And... well, it's not happening, with a Jew as a mouthpiece or without him.

At least he seems less fake than Scott McClellan.
